mapper.insert: insert into commu_qna values(null,#{commu_num},#{ml_num},#{qna_content},(select ifnull(max(qna_ref)+1,1) from commu_qna q),#{qna_lev},now())
mapper.select: select q.qna_num,q.qna_ref,q.qna_lev,q.qna_content,q.qna_regdate,q.ml_num, m.mb_name,p.pro_num from commu_qna q join member_info m on q.ml_num = m.ml_num join profile_img p on m.pro_num = p.pro_num where commu_num=#{commu_num} and qna_lev=0 order by qna_ref desc,qna_num asc limit #{startRow},4

select q.qna_num,q.qna_ref,q.qna_lev,q.qna_content,q.qna_regdate,ci.tutor_nickname,ci.pro_num from commu_qna q, community cm, class_info ci where ci.class_num=cm.class_num and qna_lev=1 and qna_ref=#{qna_ref} and cm.commu_num=#{commu_num} order by qna_ref desc,qna_num asc
select ifnull(count(*),0) from commu_qna where commu_num=#{commu_num} and qna_lev=0
select IFNULL(count(*), 0) cnt from community comm inner join (select class_num from class_info where ml_num = #{ml_num}) ci on comm.class_num = ci.class_num where comm.class_num = #{class_num}
mapper.update: update commu_qna set qna_content=#{qna_content} where qna_num=#{qna_num}
